Nike Air Jordan

Designed by Peter Moore, the Air Jordan 1 is the most influential shoe in sneaker history. Michael Jordan laced up a pair for the first time in 1984, changing the conversation around footwear permanently.

Adidas Yeezy

adidas and Kanye West's collaborative line debuted in 2015 with the release of the Yeezy Boost 750. Since then, adidas Yeezy has set new standards for progressive sneaker designs with the Yeezy 350, 450, 700, Foam Runner and more. Today adidas Yeezy's influence is felt across the style spectrum, from streetwear to luxury.
